duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide hands-on counsel to the company’s business units and assist General Counsel in managing the operations of legal department.
Identify and analyze legal issues, present clear recommendations, and assure legal compliance for the organization.
Assist in reviewing, tracking, and managing defensive litigation matters, including management of external counsel relationships.
Conduct legal research and prepare memorandums of law on various legal topics.
Provide legal guidance to support new product development and new delivery channels.
Monitor, review, and advise on developments in applicable state and federal laws and regulations.
Review, draft, and negotiate various legal agreements.
Recognize and respond appropriately to levels of urgency.
Build relationships with internal home office departments and branch network.

education_certification.credential: JD degree and admission to state bar required.
Licensed to practice law in Georgia (or another U.S. state with the ability to practice in-house in Georgia).
